Appearance

Draw.io SkillAI-powered diagram creation for Claude Code

Create professional diagrams with natural language and real-time browser preview

Get Started
View on GitHub

Natural Language → Diagram

Describe what you need in plain English, and get professional diagrams instantly.

Real-time Preview

See your changes instantly in your browser as you iterate on your designs.

Multiple Diagram Types

Support for flowcharts, architecture diagrams, sequence diagrams, and more.

Edit Existing Diagrams

Modify diagrams with precision using ID-based operations.

Export & Save

Save your work as .drawio files for future editing.

MCP Integration

Seamless integration with Claude Code through Model Context Protocol.

Quick Start ​

```bash

Install the skill ​

git clone https://github.com/bahayonghang/drawio-skills.git ~/.claude/skills/drawio ```

Once installed, simply ask Claude:

"Create a flowchart for user authentication"

What This Skill Adds ​

This skill extends the powerful next-ai-draw-io MCP server with:

  • Workflow guidance for creating and editing diagrams
  • XML format reference with style properties and common shapes
  • Diagram patterns for flowcharts and architecture diagrams
  • Automatic MCP configuration via .mcp.json

Example Diagrams ​

Flowchart ​

Ask Claude: "Create a flowchart showing the order processing workflow"

Architecture Diagram ​

Ask Claude: "Draw a three-tier web application architecture"
